data.title: Harold Lloyd Jr. Movies and Shows
data.meta_description: Learn about Harold Lloyd Jr. on Apple TV. Browse shows and movies that feature Harold Lloyd Jr. including Married Too Young, Frankenstein's Daughter, â¦
data.text: Harold Lloyd Jr. was an actor who had a successful Hollywood career. In 1953, he made his screen debut in "The Flaming Urge." In 1958, he appeared in Richard Cunha's "Frankenstein's Daughter." Lloyd began his career with a role in the drama "Girls' Town" (1959) with Mamie Van Doren. Lloyd next focused his career on film, appearing in the Mickey Rooney drama "Platinum High School" (1960). Later in his career, Lloyd acted in the Mamie Van Doren comedy "Sex Kittens Go to College" (1960). Lloyd passed away in June 1971 at the age of 40.
